comments.text: The best hymn in the world !
comments.author: Nikita

comments.text: When I die, don’t bring me to the hospital. Bring me to Anfield. I was born there and will die there
comments.author: Steven Gerrard

comments.text: Manchester United is stronger than anybody in the world.
comments.author: Eric Cantona

comments.text: Every manager dreams of managing Manchester United.
comments.author: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer

comments.text: I've always been clear - I feel good at Chelsea. Every week, I repeat the same on PSG. It's a big team but an inferior league.
comments.author: Eden Hazard
